sentences.english: Today, to the point of interest, to talk about your marksmanship.
sentences.chinese: 今天来了点兴趣，就来谈谈枪法吧。

sentences.english: He was daringand resourceful besides being a fine shot.
sentences.chinese: 他不只是枪法好，而且还机智勇敢。

sentences.english: The sniper shoots so exactly that no one can escape his shots.
sentences.chinese: 这名狙击手的枪法很准，没人能逃过他的狙击。

sentences.english: I know how to shoot and I shoot well.
sentences.chinese: 我知道怎样射击，并且我枪法很准。

sentences.english: Leaf-disc method and microprojectile bombardment were adopted for gene transformation.
sentences.chinese: 转化方法以叶盘法为主，辅助使用了基因枪法。

sentences.english: Old stone young and Luo Daquan compare marksmanship, equal.
sentences.chinese: 陈石仔和罗大全比枪法，不相上下。

sentences.english: Thirty seconds later someone shot both of them. With incredible accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 30秒后有人像他们开枪，枪法准的出奇。

sentences.english: When playing across the line of fire marksmanship training from the beginning of what?
sentences.chinese: 在玩穿越火线时练枪法是从什么开始？

sentences.english: Huang feng see this dumb bean marksmanship really good, then take dumb beans.
sentences.chinese: 黄鸣锋见这个哑豆枪法确实不错，便收下哑豆。

sentences.english: By the way, your marksmanship is quasi -.
Why are all the subconscious mercenaries such bad shots?
sentences.chinese: 为什么所有潜意识里的防御者都枪法都这么烂？
